ai-anya-e0105n8:1_0: He laid down in the midst of the harnessed. Then he rose into the air and, wishing to subduence, raised his joined palms to herd, and observing an aspect of the courtesan. It informed the royal treasury. He wins it in battle, establishing himself as foremost.
ai-anya-e0105n8:1_1: But because of famine, thieves, and afflicted with it. You’re unable to nurse the monks with all the monks, as they live on that path and don’t get those four friends.
ai-anya-e0105n8:1_2: And when the senior monks are cured, they sit down, tied up on rubbish heaps, plows, pedig them on the ground, and pull them out, down.
ai-anya-e0105n8:1_3: In this way she who had twelve years of seniority would lose their wrap.
ai-anya-e0105n8:1_4: But when it appears to the king of Vebhaliṅga, king of mountains, reverses, and jeweled earrings, and he would depraved their vehicles; he pulled up lotus bulbs, drink, clothes, and bedding.
ai-anya-e0105n8:1_5: And they made those senior mendicants their names and clans.
ai-anya-e0105n8:1_6: and one of the great earth. He made a chopped into that lake and the turmeric, and even one in that broad earth. Then he too has mastered its chest with its head; otherwise protected, and possessed the eight parts.
ai-anya-e0105n8:1_7: Because of this there was a famine, a barley, with rotter, crooked things.
ai-anya-e0105n8:2_0: and he gave his own dwelling.
ai-anya-e0105n8:2_2: and the Sangha did what he had been stored.
ai-anya-e0105n8:2_3: He traveled by boat to a door, and then went to her dwelling place for the senior monks. He started to stay together with the most senior monk, and only two.
ai-anya-e0105n8:2_4: And those two senior monks did not build their dwellings to the great dance, while they were staying still.
ai-anya-e0105n8:2_5: for the purpose of going against the stream.
ai-anya-e0105n8:2_6: Then, Sīha, a boat of lion, king of tiger, and fearful, scared, two goblins.
ai-anya-e0105n8:2_7: This is the first blessing to decline.
